Doorway picture
 
The doorway picture is given to Laura Palmer by Mrs. Chalfont. It is explored by Laura in her dream. She "enters" the picture frame into a first room and makes her way into a second Room where Mrs. Chalfont points her to yet another room. She enters a third room where Mrs. Chalfont's grandson awaits in the dark. He snaps his fingers and the room is lit. The room then dissolves into the familiar red drapes and black and white zig-zag floor of the Black Lodge.
